products.body_html:
The breathable microfiber fabric in our SILVERAIR High Waist Thigh Slimmer beautifully smooths your hips, thighs, and tummy.
Offering maximum coverage below the waist without a girdle look.
The SILVERAIR fabric has “anti-odor” silver technology embedded in the microfiber that eliminates odor-causing bacteria. This silver treatment in the yarn also inhibits bacterial growth and prevents shrinkage after repeated washes.
  • Breathable- super lightweight seamless yarns  
  • “Anti odor” silver technology for all-day wear
  • “No roll” silicon waist Band
  • High waist smoothing
  • Tummy taming/ love handle control/ butt defining.
  • Thigh control - 2 ply ultimate in smoothing
  • Moisture management finish
  • No “VPL" (no visible panty lines)

Fabric: 76% Nylon 6.6 yarns with anti-bacterial and proven anti-viral properties / 24% Spandex

Imported
products.title: SILVERAIR - HIGH WAIST THIGH SLIMMER SHORT

products.body_html:
Our SilverAir high-waisted boy short is beyond comfortable. It is designed with a unique fabric that will keep you feeling fresh all day with its advanced technology and moisture management.

This non-roll waistband will hold you in at the waist while you perform all-day activities. The high waistband helps smooth out your tummy area and trims off any extra roll around your mid-section.

  • Breathable - super lightweight seamless yarns  
  • “Anti Odor” silver technology for all-day wear
  • “No Roll” silicon waistband
  • High waist smoothing
  • Tummy taming/ love handle control/ butt defining.
  • Moisture management finish
  • No “VPL” (no visible panty lines)

Fabric: 76% Nylon 6.6 yarns with anti-bacterial and proven anti-viral properties / 24% Spandex

Imported
products.title: SILVERAIR - HIGH WAIST BOY SHORT

products.body_html:
Our SILVERAIR Brief is constructed of our “Silver” technology yarns that are permanently infused with silver. The result is a fabric that eliminates odor-causing bacteria on contact and keeps it gone for the life of the garment.
It’s our most luxurious brief yet and features an elastic waistband with no bulky seams, a super high back, and super lightweight seamless yarns.

  • Breathable - super lightweight seamless yarns 
  • “Anti odor” silver technology for all-day wear
  • “No roll” silicon waistband
  • High waist smoothing
  • Tummy taming/ love handle control/ butt defining.
  • Moisture management finish
  • No “VPL” (no visible panty lines)
  • Hi leg opening for comfort and clearance

Fabric: 76% Nylon 6.6 yarns with anti-bacterial and proven anti-viral properties / 24% Spandex

Imported
products.title: SILVERAIR - HIGH WAIST PANTY BRIEF

products.body_html:
• Super lightweight, breathable & moisture-wicking
  • Antibacterial - reduce odor for a fresher felling
  • “Anti odor” silver technology for all day wear
  • Seamless technology - protect your delicate skin from chafing
  • Unique knitting technique - comfort and performance, protect you from unnecessary exposure to harmful bacteria
  • Super stretch
